title: Hannah Brown carries 'Not Today Satan' phone cover... after crying during harsh criticism
text:
She's one of the seven Dancing With The Stars contestants left on season 28.

And following a tough week with harsh critique, Hannah Brown appeared to be putting the haters and negativity aside and solely focusing on her dance.

The 25-year-old beauty was spotted walking into rehearsal on Wednesday with a 'Not Today Satan' phone cover in her hand.

Scroll down for video

Not in the mood: Hannah Brown was spotted heading into her Dancing With The Stars rehearsal on Wednesday with a 'Not Today Satan' phone case

Hannah donned a white sweater that was slightly cropped and showcased her toned stomach.

She teamed the look with a pair of form-fitting tights with a bold pattern down the side.

The beauty completed her ensemble with highlighter yellow sneakers and a backpack.

One track mind: Hannah meant business and ensured all could see her case

Casual: Hannah donned a white sweater that was slightly cropped and showcased her toned stomach

Hannah's light brunette hair was styled back into a braid to ensure it's kept off of her face.

The former Bachelorette opted for a natural amount of makeup complete with a sweep of blush on her cheeks and a brush of mascara on her eyelashes.

The beauty faced criticism from the judges that she and others felt to be harsh following her performance on Monday.

And after writing a lengthy post on Tuesday, professional dancer Cheryl Burke weighed in on the matter on Wednesday.

Not impressed: The beauty faced criticism from the judges that she and others felt to be harsh following her performance on Monday

Trying her best: Hannah revealed in a lengthy post that she was giving the experience her all

'I think there’s a lot of pressure for her, but at the end of the day, she needs to remember that it’s all in her head and it’s all the haters,' she told Us.

'Don’t let the haters get the best of you. I’ve gone through seasons and even though I’m a pro dancer, I’ve messed with my own head so much that I forgot a step myself, and it really is all psychological.'

Cheryl continued to lift up Hannah's low spirits.

'She needs to know that she’s an amazing dancer and she needs to embrace it. Even if you have no dance experience, you know when someone’s insecure or when someone’s not. I think that Hannah is trying her best but if you have downtime to look through your social media, don’t!'

'I think now, social media can actually be more negative than positive, and because you’re past halfway through the competition, we’re all susceptible because we’ve worked so hard. She needs to know that she is amazing and to own it at whatever style that is.'

Tips for Hannah: 'I think there’s a lot of pressure for her, but at the end of the day, she needs to remember that it’s all in her head and it’s all the haters,' professional dancer Cheryl Burke said on Wednesday

Trying her best: Within the lengthy post, Hannah told her social media followers that she was 'busting her ass' but there was a disconnect

She finished: 'Who cares if one judge doesn’t like [her] style of dancing? It doesn’t mean that the rest of the world doesn’t love it. She needs to go out there and know that she’s a badass and sell it.'

Within the lengthy post, Hannah told her social media followers that she was 'busting her ass' but there was a disconnect.

'It’s true there is a disconnect. I am busting my ass. I am giving this my all. It’s my focus and passion right now,' she said.

'But each week I fall flat. I’ve gotten to the point of being so anxious before I perform that I can’t completely enjoy it like I wish and know I could.'

And in a sweet twist, her ex Tyler Cameron took to the comments section to console her.

'Fall down 7 times, get up 8!' he wrote.
description: Hannah Brown was spotted heading into her Dancing With The Stars rehearsal on Wednesday with a 'Not Today Satan' phone case.
